mapper.select:
select
from INDUCTOR_ASSETS_INFO
ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM METER_INFO WHERE ID IN (SELECT METER_ID FROM USER_METER_REL WHERE USER_ID = #{id}))
mapper.update:
update INDUCTOR_ASSETS_INFO
INDUCTOR_ASSETS_NO = #{inductorAssetsNo},
INDUCTOR_TYPE = #{inductorType},
TURNS = #{turns},
CT_CURNT_CODE = #{ctCurntCode},
CT_VOLT_CODE = #{ctVoltCode},
PT_CURNT_CODE = #{ptCurntCode},
PT_VOLT_CODE = #{ptVoltCode},
RATED_CT_CODE = #{ratedCtCode},
RATED_PT_CODE = #{ratedPtCode},
MADE_DATE = #{madeDate},
LIFE_SPAN = #{lifeSpan},
DET_PERIOD = #{detPeriod},
LAST_DET_DATE = #{lastDetDate},
ACCU_LEVEL_CODE = #{accuLevelCode},
PT_ACCU_LEVEL_CODE = #{ptAccuLevelCode},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
REMARK = #{remark},
STATUS = #{status},
BATCH_NO = #{batchNo},
RIGHT_ATTACH = #{rightAttach},
MAN_ID = #{manID},
MADE_NO = #{madeNo}
MODEL_CODE = #{modelCode}
and ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
select ,1 PARENT from INDUCTOR_ASSETS_INFO
and ID = ${_parameter}
